import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./sidebar.css"; import Logo from "../../assets/logo.svg"; const Sidebar = () => { const [toggle, showMenu] = useState(false); return ( <>
© 2025-2026.
showMenu(!toggle)} >
); }; export default Sidebar;
